author: Howard Levitt
title: Howard Levitt: Some law firms are telling companies not to disclose which employee has COVID-19. That’s misguided and dangerous
description: Employers face challenging balance between ensuring workplace safety and protecting privacy
content:
How do you maintain a safe workplace while respecting the rights of your employees?
